lines.text: Queer cuss! He makes a specialty of helpin' kids that's born in shame.
In the midst of the outlaw gang, grew little Sarah May, like a white flower among poisonous weeds.
Your gal said I could bunk here if you didn't mind.
Fourth of July, I stuck up a Chinaman!
You're a queer bad man! What do you get out of it?
I like to keep two jumps ahead of a sheriff. It helps me to forget. To forget that there's no decent place for me in the world 'cause I never had no father.
When are you and me goin' to be friendly?
And my mother was married accordin' to law?
You're damn brave, ain't you - when your gang's all around you!
If any of your galoots want me, you'll find me at the edge of the horizon!
